edu.oakland.mvc

Class ThemeNameViewSelectorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.oakland.mvc.ThemeNameViewSelectorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IViewSelector

    public class ThemeNameViewSelectorImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IViewSelector
    A simple implementation of IViewSelector with only one method. Determines whether the desktop or mobile view is requested. If a logger is enabled, a log will be made of these results.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0, 2012-08-30
    Author:
    Aaron Grant

    • Method Detail

      • isMobile

        public boolean isMobile(PortletRequest request)
        Determines if the desktop or mobile theme should be used by comparing the requested theme against the list of possible mobile themes. Assumes a desktop environment if there is no requested theme found or the requested theme does not match any of the mobile themes.
        Specified by:
        isMobile in interface IViewSelector
        Parameters:
        request - a PortletRequest that contains information such as available desktop or mobile themes and which of these themes (if any) is being requested
        Returns:
        true if the mobile view is requested
